entries.gig_mission_dance_start: Follow the waypoint to your local cantina, go inside and dance for 2 minutes.
entries.gig_mission_music_start: Follow the waypoint to your local cantina, go inside and play a song for 2 minutes.
entries.gig_mission_arrival: You've arrived at the cantina, go inside and start your performance.
entries.survey_mission_start: Use your survey tool to locate a XX% density patch of blah, a type of such and such.
entries.destroy_mission_start: Follow the waypoint to target and destroy it.
entries.gig_mission_complete: You have completed your sample Gig Mission.
entries.survey_mission_complete: You have completed your sample Survey Mission.
entries.destroy_mission_complete: You have completed your sample Destroy Mission
entries.heal_mission_start: Follow the waypoint to %TT and use the given medicine to heal %OT.
entries.heal_mission_arrival: You have found your patient, start healing %OT as soon as possible.
entries.heal_mission_complete: You have successfully healed your patient.
entries.harvest_mission_start: Follow the waypoint to your target and kill it.
entries.harvest_mission_target_dead: Now that your target is dead, use your skills to harvest the natural resources from it.
entries.harvest_mission_complete: You have successfully harvested resources from your target.
entries.heal_mission_need_target: You need to have a target to use this medicine.
entries.heal_mission_wrong_target: This is not the correct patient.
